channel.title: CVE Feed for ifm -- moneo appliance
channel.description: The latest CVEs for ifm -- moneo appliance

item.title: CVE-2022-3485|2024-08-03T01:14:01.533Z -- ifm -- moneo%20appliance
item.description: In IFM Moneo Appliance with version up to 1.9.3 an unauthenticated remote attacker can reset the administrator password by only supplying the serial number and thus gain full control of the device.
